# cmccloudv2_volume_backup (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_volume_backup" "backup_1" {
    name 		= "backup1"
    volume_id 	= "642109d2-49ab-48b1-8fc7-8f1909c33a1c"
    incremental = false
    force 		= true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the backup
- `volume_id` (String) The ID of the Volume to backup

### Optional

- `force` (Boolean) If true, it will force the backup to be created even if the volume is not in a stable state. Default is false
- `incremental` (Boolean) If true, it is incremental backup, if false, it is full backup. Default is false
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the backup
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `real_size_gb` (Number) The real size of the backup in GB
- `status` (String) The status of the backup
- `volume_name` (String) The name of the volume
- `volume_size` (Number) The size of backuped volume in GB

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
